update p_user_site
`uid` = #{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
`name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
site = #{site,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
isDefault = #{isDefault,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update p_user_site set `uid` = #{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, site = #{site,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isDefault = #{isDefault,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id,uid,`name`,phone,site,isDefault,createTime from p_user_site where uid=#{0} order by isDefault desc,id desc
select id,uid,`name`,phone,site,isDefault,createTime from p_user_site where uid=#{0} limit 1
